text: Ðis syndan ðære þryre hida landgemære æt Hylle.
Of ðam ealdan hornforda suð on ðone herpeð.
Of ðam herpaðe west on ða lange rewe on ðone stan.
Of ðon stane west be wyrtrum on fiducforda.
Of fiducforda adun on ðone stream.
Of ðan streame on norðeward efslea.
Of hudecumes heafde adun on ealda tan.
Swa anlang streames on ealda hornford.
